subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Billy Wagner nearly let a four-run lead in the ninth inning of Game 6 of the N.L.C.S. slip away Wednesday night, but regrouped to close out the game.
snippet: Billy Wagner nearly let a four-run lead in the ninth inning of Game 6 of the N.L.C.S. slip away Wednesday night, but regrouped to close out the game.
